short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension collects the authors of identical posts into one, thus making it easy to read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This application will make it easier to read Twitch chat on channels with a large flow of messages. The application finds messages containing repeated words or emoticons and collects the names of the authors into one message.
